a.n: SuperSonics/Suns, 1993 Western Conference Finals - Game 5 - Popcast

p.k: Added pop up facts throughout the game in which Charles Barkley's triple double (43 pts, 15 reb, 10 assists) helped the Suns secure a one game lead over the SuperSonics. Dan Majerle poured in 34 points (including eight 3-s') as well.
